Reference

Package Information

ReviewR

ReviewR: A light-weight, portable tool for reviewing individual patient records

Start Using ReviewR

Execute this function to launch ReviewR.

run_app()

Run the ReviewR Application

Data Model Support

List the data models with built in support in ReviewR.

supported_datamodels

Supported Data Model Schemas

REDCap Support

Supported REDCap field types and survey complete responses.

redcap_widget_map

REDCap Widget Map

redcap_survey_complete

REDCap Survey Complete

Development Functions

Use these functions to extend the functionality of ReviewR. These functions are not user facing, please run devtools::load_all() or preface each devlopment function with ReviewR::: to access their functionality.

dev_add_database_module()

Develop A Database Module

dev_add_datamodel()

Develop Data Model Table Functions

dev_add_google_client_id()

Add Google Client ID

Development Templates

Templates used to extend the functionality of ReviewR. These templates are utilized by the development functions.

db_module_template

Database Module Template

db_function_all_patients_table_template

Database Table Function: All Patients Table Template

db_function_subject_table_template

Database Table Function: Subject Table Template
